avdta.sav

Class SAVDest

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.node.Location
      • avdta.network.node.Node
        • avdta.network.node.Zone
          • avdta.sav.SAVZone
            • avdta.sav.SAVDest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Node>, ICoordinate, MapMarker, MapObject

    public class SAVDest
extends SAVZone
    The SAVDest is like a normal centroid except that it creates an event when SAVs arrive at the destination. Taxis arrive here, and if they unload passengers, must wait for a specified dwell time (Taxi.DELAY_EXIT). After the dwell time has elapsed, taxis are parked at the linked SAVOrigin (see Zone.getLinkedZone()).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • step

        public int step()
        This method removes taxis from incoming centroid connectors and calls addTaxi(avdta.sav.Taxi). In addition, taxis that have elapsed their dwell time will be added to the linked SAVOrigin.
        Overrides:
        step in class Zone
        Returns:
        the number of exiting vehicles

      • addTaxi

        public int addTaxi(Taxi t)
        Adds a taxi to the destination. Any travelers in the taxi that are destined for this destination will exit. The taxi will park at this destination for Taxi.DELAY_EXIT, then be added to the linked SAVOrigin.
        Specified by:
        addTaxi in class SAVZone
        Parameters:
        t - the taxi to be added
        Returns:
        the number of exiting travelers
